summary: This document is a medical bill from Medanta Hospital & Diagnostics for patient Rahul Gandhi, dated 27/02/2025. The bill includes charges for consultations, lab tests, radiology, scans, medicine, nursing, room, ambulance, surgical procedure, post-operative care, and administrative fees. The subtotal is INR 35,250, with a discount of INR 1,500 and service tax of INR 6,111, resulting in a grand total of INR 39,861. Payment is pending and due on 05/03/2025.

Patient Information.Address: House No. 15, Shanti Vihar; South Extension; New Delhi, Delhi, 110049
